issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description:
*Assessment*

As part of setting up an [ELB health check to an AutoScaling group|http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AutoScaling/latest/DeveloperGuide/as-add-elb-healthcheck.html#as-add-elb-healthcheck-cli], the following command is stated to be used:

{code}
$ euscale-update-auto-scaling-group –-health-check-type ELB –-grace-period 300 NginxScalingGroup
{code}

This command fails on Eucalyptus 3.4.2 cloud:

{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euscale-update-auto-scaling-group –-health-check-type ELB –-grace-period 300 NginxScalingGroup
usage: euscale-update-auto-scaling-group [--default-cooldown SECONDS]
                                         [--desired-capacity COUNT]
                                         [--grace-period SECONDS]
                                         [--health-check-type {EC2,ELB}]
                                         [-l LAUNCHCONFIG] [-M COUNT]
                                         [-m COUNT]
                                         [--placement-group PLACEMENTGROUP]
                                         [--termination-policies POLICY1,POLICY2,...]
                                         [--vpc-zone-identifier ZONE1,ZONE2,...]
                                         [-z ZONE1,ZONE2,...]
                                         [--region USER@REGION | -U URL]
                                         [-I KEY_ID] [-S KEY] [--debug]
                                         [--debugger] [--version] [-h]
                                         ASGROUP
euscale-update-auto-scaling-group: error: unrecognized arguments: ELB –-grace-period 300 NginxScalingGroup
{code}

*Pertinent Data*

This keeps cloud users from deploying a fully working version of a [load balanced, autoscaling group|http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AutoScaling/latest/DeveloperGuide/US_SetUpASLBApp.html].

*Steps*

* Set up Eucalyptus 3.4.2 cloud, with Load Balancer service enabled
* Bundle, Uploaded, Register EMI (e.g. Ubuntu Cloud Image)
* Create Load Balancer
* Create AutoScaling Group
{code}
$ euscale-create-auto-scaling-group NginxScalingGroup --launch-configuration NginxLaunchConfig --load-balancers NginxLoadBalancer --availability-zones UndergroundLuxury --min-size 2 --max-size 3
{code}
* Update AutoScaling Group with health check:
{code}
$ euscale-update-auto-scaling-group –-health-check-type ELB –-grace-period 300 NginxScalingGroup
{code}

*Signs*

* Tried with different variations.  Still didn't work:
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euscale-update-auto-scaling-group NginxScalingGroup –-health-check-type ELB –-grace-period 300
usage: euscale-update-auto-scaling-group [--default-cooldown SECONDS]
                                         [--desired-capacity COUNT]
                                         [--grace-period SECONDS]
                                         [--health-check-type {EC2,ELB}]
                                         [-l LAUNCHCONFIG] [-M COUNT]
                                         [-m COUNT]
                                         [--placement-group PLACEMENTGROUP]
                                         [--termination-policies POLICY1,POLICY2,...]
                                         [--vpc-zone-identifier ZONE1,ZONE2,...]
                                         [-z ZONE1,ZONE2,...]
                                         [--region USER@REGION | -U URL]
                                         [-I KEY_ID] [-S KEY] [--debug]
                                         [--debugger] [--version] [-h]
                                         ASGROUP
euscale-update-auto-scaling-group: error: unrecognized arguments: –-health-check-type ELB –-grace-period 300

[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euscale-update-auto-scaling-group –-health-check-type ELB –-grace-period 300 NginxScalingGroup
usage: euscale-update-auto-scaling-group [--default-cooldown SECONDS]
                                         [--desired-capacity COUNT]
                                         [--grace-period SECONDS]
                                         [--health-check-type {EC2,ELB}]
                                         [-l LAUNCHCONFIG] [-M COUNT]
                                         [-m COUNT]
                                         [--placement-group PLACEMENTGROUP]
                                         [--termination-policies POLICY1,POLICY2,...]
                                         [--vpc-zone-identifier ZONE1,ZONE2,...]
                                         [-z ZONE1,ZONE2,...]
                                         [--region USER@REGION | -U URL]
                                         [-I KEY_ID] [-S KEY] [--debug]
                                         [--debugger] [--version] [-h]
                                         ASGROUP
euscale-update-auto-scaling-group: error: unrecognized arguments: ELB –-grace-period 300 NginxScalingGroup

[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euscale-update-auto-scaling-group –-health-check-type ELB –-grace-period 300 NginxScalingGroup
usage: euscale-update-auto-scaling-group [--default-cooldown SECONDS]
                                         [--desired-capacity COUNT]
                                         [--grace-period SECONDS]
                                         [--health-check-type {EC2,ELB}]
                                         [-l LAUNCHCONFIG] [-M COUNT]
                                         [-m COUNT]
                                         [--placement-group PLACEMENTGROUP]
                                         [--termination-policies POLICY1,POLICY2,...]
                                         [--vpc-zone-identifier ZONE1,ZONE2,...]
                                         [-z ZONE1,ZONE2,...]
                                         [--region USER@REGION | -U URL]
                                         [-I KEY_ID] [-S KEY] [--debug]
                                         [--debugger] [--version] [-h]
                                         ASGROUP
euscale-update-auto-scaling-group: error: unrecognized arguments: ELB –-grace-period 300 NginxScalingGroup

[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euscale-update-auto-scaling-group –-health-check-type ELB –-grace-period 300 NginxScalingGroup
usage: euscale-update-auto-scaling-group [--default-cooldown SECONDS]
                                         [--desired-capacity COUNT]
                                         [--grace-period SECONDS]
                                         [--health-check-type {EC2,ELB}]
                                         [-l LAUNCHCONFIG] [-M COUNT]
                                         [-m COUNT]
                                         [--placement-group PLACEMENTGROUP]
                                         [--termination-policies POLICY1,POLICY2,...]
                                         [--vpc-zone-identifier ZONE1,ZONE2,...]
                                         [-z ZONE1,ZONE2,...]
                                         [--region USER@REGION | -U URL]
                                         [-I KEY_ID] [-S KEY] [--debug]
                                         [--debugger] [--version] [-h]
                                         ASGROUP
euscale-update-auto-scaling-group: error: unrecognized arguments: ELB –-grace-period 300 NginxScalingGroup
{code}
fields.environment:
*non-HA, single cluster
** 1 x CLC
** 1 x Walrus
** 1 x CC/SC (Overlay)
** 1 x NC
* output of euca-describe-services
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-describe-services
SERVICE	cloudwatch     	cloudwatch     	10.104.10.55   	ENABLED   	34  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/CloudWatch	arn:euca:eucalyptus:cloudwatch:cloudwatch:10.104.10.55/

SERVICE	notifications  	eucalyptus     	10.104.10.55   	ENABLED   	34  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Notifications	arn:euca:eucalyptus::notifications:10.104.10.55/

SERVICE	loadbalancing  	loadbalancing  	10.104.10.55   	ENABLED   	34  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/LoadBalancing	arn:euca:eucalyptus:loadbalancing:loadbalancing:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	walrus         	walrus         	PaperRoute     	ENABLED   	34  	http://10.104.10.11:8773/services/Walrus	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:PaperRoute/
SERVICE	reporting      	bootstrap      	10.104.10.55   	ENABLED   	34  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Reporting	arn:euca:bootstrap::reporting:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	jetty          	eucalyptus     	10.104.10.55   	ENABLED   	34  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Jetty 	arn:euca:eucalyptus::jetty:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	tokens         	eucalyptus     	10.104.10.55   	ENABLED   	34  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Tokens	arn:euca:eucalyptus::tokens:10.104.10.55/

comments.body:
Ah, yep that was it.  I think it was a failure of copy and paste from the documentation on my part.  I tried it again (typing it by hand), and it worked.

{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euscale-update-auto-scaling-group --health-check-type ELB --grace-period 300 NginxScalingGroup
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euscale-describe-auto-scaling-groups
AUTO-SCALING-GROUP	NginxScalingGroup	NginxLaunchConfig	UndergroundLuxury	NginxLoadBalancer	2	3	2	NewestInstance
INSTANCE	i-D49986FE	UndergroundLuxury	InService	Healthy	NginxLaunchConfig
INSTANCE	i-A400FC3B	UndergroundLuxury	InService	Healthy	NginxLaunchConfig
{code}
Copy and paste mistake from the instructions.  Dashes were replaced with a hyphen on one of the options, therefore closing this ticket.
